name: Skalo - scale thru the space.
description:
SCALE THRU THE SPACE.


„Skalo" is different. „Skalo" is a new experience. „Skalo" is your new challenge. It is difficult to descripe this game. You have to feel it. play the game and you will understand. The game includes 31 different levels that have to be mastered.

at the end i only can say: „Simply, Scale Up & Scale Down."

– Intuitive Control
– Extraordinary Gameplay
– 31 Levels

PRESS KIT
